title: 03/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Adrian Wojnarowski
itunes:title: 03/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Adrian Wojnarowski
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan reacts to the latest developments related to the sexual misconduct allegations surrounding Houston Texan quarterback Deshaun Watson. Also, dissecting the layers of NFL Draft measurables for certain prospects--the NFL Combine plays an important role in showing coaches, scouts and executives the intangibles of players. Finally, NBA trade deadline talk with ESPN Senior NBA Insider Adrian Wojnarowski, host of The Woj Pod.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
